txt_en: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
txt_cn: 千里之行，始于足下。
author: Chinese Proverb

txt_en: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
txt_cn: 准备是成功的关键，这比其他任何事情都重要。
author: Alexander Graham Bell

txt_en: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved.
txt_cn: 我们的生命应当物尽其用，而非固守保存。
author: D. H. Lawrence

txt_en: An unexamined life is not worth living.
txt_cn: 浑浑噩噩的生活不值得过。
author: Socrates

txt_en: It's your life; you don't need someone's permission to live the life you want.
txt_cn: 生活是你自己的，想过什么样的生活，不需要别人的许可。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one.
txt_cn: 读书者一生中可以体验一千种人生，而从不阅读的人只能活这一次。
author: George R.R. Martin

txt_en: The goal isn't to live forever; the goal is to create something that will.
txt_cn: 人生的目标不是要获得永生，而是要创造永恒。
author: Chuck Palahniuk

txt_en: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
txt_cn: 永远记住你是独一无二的，就像其他人一样。
author: Margaret Mead

txt_en: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
txt_cn: 宁可在创新中失败，也不要在模仿中成功。
author: Herman Melville

txt_en: Life is trying things to see if they work.
txt_cn: 生活就是尝试事物，看看它们是否奏效。
author: Ray Bradbury

txt_en: Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
txt_cn: 要追求进步，而不是一味地寻找借口，要寻求尊重，而不是一味地博取关注。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: You can neither win nor lose if you don't run the race.
txt_cn: 如果不参加比赛，你既不会赢也不会输。
author: David Bowie

txt_en: Humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat.
txt_cn: 就算可能失败，也要继续前行，可谓是真正的人。
author: Ralph Ellison

txt_en: We reform others unconsciously when we walk uprightly.
txt_cn: 当我们行为端正，就会无意中转化他人。
author: Sophie Swetchine

txt_en: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
txt_cn: 我们失败是因为我们告诉自己失败了。
author: Leo Tolstoy

txt_en: None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are.
txt_cn: 没有人能真正随着时间的推移而改变， 我们只是逐渐成为更加圆满的自己。
author: Anne Rice

txt_en: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience.
txt_cn: 你首先得耐下心，才能学会有耐心。
author: Stanislaw J. Lec

txt_en: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
txt_cn: 梦想，说到底，是规划的一种形式。
author: Gloria Steinem

txt_en: Everyone is necessarily the hero of his own life story.
txt_cn: 每个人都必定是自己人生故事中的主角。
author: John Barth

txt_en: Difficult times often bring out the best in people.
txt_cn: 困境总能激发出人最好的一面。
author: Bernie Sanders

txt_en: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
txt_cn: 不论别人怎么说，言语和想法能改变世界。
author: Robin Williams

txt_en: Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
txt_cn: 别放弃。现在吃点苦，然后带着冠军的荣耀度过余生。
author: Muhammad Ali

txt_en: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore.
txt_cn: 父母的存在，是有意让孩子忽略一些事情，从而让他们感到欢乐。
author: Ogden Nash
